DOC.brief_summary: The child health sport center , Meir Medical Center , run 10 year intervention program treat obese child . The program include physical activity , nutritional intervention behavioral treatment . A similar program exists nearby city Hadera . The aim program promote weight loss , encourage physical activity modify behavior order get long term result . The aim present study try identify demographic behavioral characteristic child succeed program .
DOC.brief_title: Predictors Success Intervention Program Treatment Childhood Obesity
DOC.criteria: Obese / overweight child Children organic illness cause obesity
